document.full_text: in the espn film 'the fab five,' jalen rose stated that duke recruited only black players he considered to be 'uncle toms.' grant hill, who played for duke, reflects on rose's comments.
document.title: grant hill on 'the fab five' and race
lines_and_colors: in the espn film 'the fab five,' jalen rose stated that duke recruited only black players he considered to be 'uncle toms.' grant hill, who played for duke, reflects on rose's comments.
